Vimeo Auth request handler class

Implements all API queries in the vimeo.auth.* category

checkToken (line 1627)

Check Token

Checks the validity of the token. Returns the user associated with it. Returns the same as vimeo.auth.getToken

  • access: public
VimeoAuthCheckTokenResponse checkToken ([string $sToken = false])
  • string $sToken: Authentication token
getFrob (line 1648)

Get Frob

This is generally used by desktop applications. If the user doesn't already have a token, you'll need to get the frob, send it to us at /services/auth. Then, after the user, clicks continue on your app, you call vimeo.auth.getToken($frob) and we give you the actual token.

  • access: public
VimeoAuthGetFrobResponse getFrob ()
